title: bug splatting in promos is the system fair?
body: I think that if you bug splat in champ select you should not be penalized.  Riot should be able to track this and not penalize players for their terrible client.

replies.body: They should, but all work is going towards the new client, not fixing the current one. One would assume the new client will be much stabler.
